feed.title: DocuSeal Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.7.8
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to unarchive not completed submissions from the submission page

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.7.9
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to add multiple webhook URLs

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.8.0
entry.content:
🆕 Add submission filters by completion/creation date or author 🆕 Add document download file formats with signer emails and date (/settings/esign preferences)

Pro

🛠 Make it possible to create conditional fields with HTML or PDF tags

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.8.1
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to add custom policy links to the signing form via /settings/personalization

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.8.2
entry.content:
🐞 Fix template form builder on iPad and Android tablets

Pro

🆕 Add conditional documents 🆕 Add template access permissions (Admin-only templates)
